qa_pair.question: Scrub the following candidate text and report how many categories of protected characteristics were found: "Sarah Johnson is a 28-year-old female engineer. She is married with one child and graduated from MIT in 2018. She has 6 years of Python experience." Respond with just the number.

Remove only gender references from this text and count the redactions: "Mr. David Lee is an experienced developer. He has worked at several companies where he led teams. His expertise includes cloud architecture." Respond with just the count of redactions made.

Scrub all protected characteristics from: "Michael Brown is a 45-year-old senior architect who attends church regularly. He is divorced and has expertise in Java and system design. His previous role was at Amazon." Then report the scrubbed character count (total characters in scrubbed text). Respond with just the number.

Process this candidate profile for evaluation, scrubbing protected characteristics: "Jennifer Martinez is a 32-year-old Hispanic woman with 8 years in data science. She is married and has published 5 papers on machine learning. Strong Python and R skills." Does the evaluation prompt mention specific skills? Answer True or False.

Scrub only age and race/ethnicity from: "Alex Chen is a 29-year-old Asian software engineer. Graduated from Stanford in 2017. Expert in TypeScript, React, and Node.js. Led 3 major projects." Which categories were scrubbed? Answer with comma-separated list in alphabetical order.

Generate an evaluation prompt for this candidate after scrubbing: "Robert Williams is an elderly gentleman who has been programming for 30 years. He is a devout Christian and father of three. Expertise in C++, systems programming, and mentoring junior developers." Does the final evaluation prompt contain the word "Christian"? Answer True or False.

Scrub protected characteristics from: "Lisa Anderson is disabled and uses a wheelchair. She is a 35-year-old female product manager with 10 years of experience at Google. She has an MBA from Harvard and specializes in B2B SaaS products." How many total redactions are made? Respond with just the number.

Process for evaluation with only gender and marital_status scrubbed: "Thomas Garcia is a 40-year-old male director. He is married with two kids. Has 15 years leading engineering teams, scaled products to 10M users, and holds 3 patents." After scrubbing, is the age "40" still visible in the text? Answer True or False.

Scrub all protected characteristics from: "Maria Rodriguez is a young Latina engineer fresh out of college. She is single and lives with her parents. Strong skills in Python, Django, and PostgreSQL. Completed 2 internships at tech startups." What is the original text length in characters (including spaces)? Respond with just the number.

Generate an evaluation for this candidate: "James Wilson is a 50-year-old African American senior developer. He is a father of two and regularly volunteers at his mosque. He has 20 years of Java experience, created 3 open-source projects with 10K+ stars, and mentored 50+ engineers." After scrubbing and evaluation, does the evaluation prompt include measurable achievements? Answer True or False.
